stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Observed Malware Believed to be Betabot
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
On 15 September 2014 a financial sector organization identified malicious network activity. A user downloaded a file identified as cox.exe (a "betabot" malware variant) via a link that was clicked through a third party email.
On 16 September 2014 an indicator match once again identified a delivery attempt from the URL http://chinamanken.com/exe/fedex.php.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
A phishing email was sent to a member of the financial sector with the subject of "Creative Cloud Serivce Purchase" which was facilitated through 3rd party email services.
Similar URLs such as chinamanbob.com, chinamannick.com, chinamanken.com, chinamansteve.com have all resolved to the IP address 94.102.52.186, which was observed by the data source.
Offensive graphics were displayed when the PHP scripts were visited.

A file was downloaded and identified as cox.exe which was also reported to be a "betabot" malware variant. The executable was identified after a user clicked on a link while reading mail through a third party email service.
Additionally, it was reported that there were PHP scripts with similar naming conventions which were hosted in a directory on chinamanken.com that was left unsecured.
Other similar "betabot" variants include the following:
1.exe 1.zip beta.exe dro.exe run.exe test.exe.
All observed variants of the chinaman<MALE NAME>.com variants have resolved to the following IP address: 94.102.52.186
Who is information: Domain 1st Registered 2014-08-27 (20 days ago) Server Location (NL) Netherlands IP Address 94.102.52.186 Hostname user186.mbenzforums.net ASN AS29073 ASN Owner Ecatel Network Continent Europe Latitude / Longitude 52.35 / 4.9167 City Amsterdam Region Noord-Holland
It was reported that this domain was previously observed with similar "betabot" deliveries.
It was reported that this domain was previously observed with similar "betabot" deliveries.
It was reported that this domain was previously observed with similar "betabot" deliveries.
